about_the_game:
Two Souls, One Body: A 2D Platformer "Date" Action !

Even though it's a single-player game, it feels like multiplayer?! In *"2D Platformer Date Action"!

Meet Socrates, your combat android. One day, his body ends up being shared with a mysterious dimensional girl named "Coneru"! They must navigate their new life, literally, together. Run, jump, punch, kick, laugh, cry, and maybe even take a detour or two on this quirky journey to save Shinjuku City from an alien invasion. This isn’t just 2D action―it's a "date"!

The adventure begins with a mission to protect the city from the mysterious invaders!


An odd and oddly cheerful alien group, the "Hateful Fruit Company," has begun its annoying invasion of peaceful Shinjuku City. Their motives? Unclear. But as you and Coneru progress through your action-packed date, the truth will unravel!

Weapon and Beam Combo Attacks!

You melee attack with your weapon! Coneru attacks from a distance with "Conerun Beam"!
　





You attack with close-range weapons, while Coneru fires her "Conerun Beam" from afar! You get to choose your weapon, but Coneru’s beam depends on her mood! Sometimes she'll come up with new beams in the middle of your date, because that’s what makes dating fun, right? Sync up your moves and unleash powerful combo attacks to blow your enemies away!

Coneru’s Energy Surge: "RunRun Mode"!

When Coneru gets in a great mood after certain conditions are met, she enters *RunRun Mode*! With insane, game-breaking speed and power, will you be able to keep up with her explosive excitement?

"Conerun Talk": Endless Chatter!

As you battle through this action-packed date, Coneru reacts to everything around with her expressions. After all, this is a date! Why fight with a serious face when you can chat, smile, and slash enemies while laughing together?

A Date to Remember

In this game, your soul and Coneru’s, two beings from different dimensions, unite as one. Embark on a special date that you can only experience in this unique 2D action adventure. It’ll be a date you'll never forget!



We’re still hard at work! Keep an eye out for updates as we continue development.
Don’t forget to add to your wishlist and follow us for the latest news!

name: CONERU -DIMENSION GIRL-

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Embark on a 2D action date with the dimension-girl, Coneru! This time, your date plan is to fend off the mysterious alien group "Hateful Fruit Company" invading Shinjuku City!
supported_languages:
Japanese*, English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
